channel.title: Gravity on Geo Salib | Me & My Thoughts!

item.title: Newtonian Binary Star System Simulation Framework
item.description: This is a framework for a realistic astrophysical simulation of a Binary Star System, written in Python using the matplotlib library. It has the orbit data of the Sirius Binary System, a random stable system, and you can enter your own data and try to find a stable orbit.
